#Setup directory paths
SET(ROOT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
SET(FFTREAL ${ROOT}/fftreal)
SET(ENMFP ${ROOT}/enmfp)
SET(ECHONEST ${ROOT}/echonest)
SET(QWT ${ROOT}/qwt)
SET(OSDAB ${ROOT}/osdab)
SET(RESAMPLE ${ROOT}/resample)
SET(ACOUSTID ${ROOT}/acoustid)
SET(FANN ${ROOT}/fann)

#Initiate sub-directories
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${FFTREAL})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${ENMFP})
#ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${ECHONEST})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${QWT})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${OSDAB})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${RESAMPLE})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${ACOUSTID})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${FANN})
